item.title: Home
item.description: I am a former electronic engineer, now studying a Communications and Signal Processing MSc at Newcastle University. This is a personal blog about electronics, machine learning, and whatever else might interest me. Opinions are my own unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Site Credits
item.description: Site: Built using Hugo Theme is Cocoa Enhanced Hosted on Github Pages Images: Site Logo: Data by Flatart from the Noun Project 404 Logo: lost by KEN MURRAY from the Noun Project Favicon: Sound by icon 54 from the Noun Project
